description.value:
Master-Crafted Relic Jump Pack of the Blood Angels. Triples normal movement instead of doubling it. Grants +20 to Command Tests and +20 to Fellowship when dealing with Blood Angels.

Requirements

Originally belonged to a Sanguinary Guard Saronath. Their body found a dry husk and armour shattered. If the character finds others in a similar state, they must investigate it.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 45 R
description.summary: Master-Crafted Relic Jump Pack of the Blood Angels. Triples normal movement instead of doubling it. Grants +20 to Command Tests and +20 to Fellowship when dealing with Blood Angels.
